text: Apionichthys menezesi is a species of sole in the family Achiridae. It was described by Robson Tamar da Costa Ramos in 2003. It inhabits the Amazon, Negro, Napo and Orinoco rivers. It reaches a maximum standard length of . ==References== Category:Pleuronectiformes Category:Fish described in 2003
title: Apionichthys menezesi
